name: Unnamed Racoon Game
description:
CONTROLS

WASD - movement

Hold G - Grab

Release G - Drop

Z - Talk with NPCs

Q - Player Switch

This is the first build that I've made and it does lack the majority of the assets. And the player doesn't even know the instructions while in-game.

This is a team project for one of our university assigments.

Our team has 1 programmer (me, a newbie), 1 sound designer, 4 artists (and yet, no assets at all) and 1 game designer.

This game was made possible by watching tutorials on Unity and Unity Documents. And also with some help from students in second and third years.
